trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_SEQ_00<tab>A way to obtain fire crystals is on the tip of Iyaate's tongue.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Iyaate.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated location and slay any blazing cerule analas that appear for clear fire crystals.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_TODO_02<tab>Survey the designated location and slay any blazing cerule analas that appear for clear fire crystals.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the clear fire crystal to Iyaate.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Wawlika.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_GRAHATIA_000_000<tab>Right. Time to put my knowledge gained in the First to use.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_KRILE_100_000<tab>Shenza has given me a list of materials. We'll see to it they have everything they need!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ALISAIE_110_000<tab>It's a shame Cid and his engineers aren't here to help. If they were here, I expect they'd turn it into a flying train.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ERENVILLE_120_000<tab>Zoraal Ja's forces remain quiet for now. If there is any movement, I'll alert everyone immediately.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_SHENZA_130_000<tab>Iyaate is sure to get you all the fire crystals you'd ever want, and then some.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_001<tab>Now I remember─cerule analas!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_002<tab>You can find them to the south of town. They actually ingest fire crystals and keep them in their gut, if you can believe it!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_003<tab>If you want the purest crystals, though, you'll have to go after the oldest, toughest analas. Nothing you can't handle, right?
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_004<tab>I'll show you where you can find some to hunt. Looking forward to seeing why Erenville thinks so highly of you.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_010<tab>There's quite a lot of fiery wildlife in these parts. We think it's due to the ceruleum, but no one can say for sure.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_011<tab>Still, it's not often that you see the bigger, dominating sort─and that's what you need.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_012<tab>What you'll have to do is hunt down a few of their kind. Establish yourself as a threat─that's known to draw out the leader.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_013<tab>That's the spirit! While you're on the hunt, I'll keep watch nearby to make sure no hapless travelers come stumbling in.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_015<tab>The leaders are certain to show up if you kill a few of the common ones. It's only a matter of when.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You see no signs of your prey. Perhaps you will have better luck to the south.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_POPMESSAGE_000_030<tab>A hefty, cantankerous anala comes lumbering towards you with murderous intent.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_040<tab>Amazing! You dealt with the beasts in no time at all!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_041<tab>You need the crystals delivered to Shenza? I'll see that he gets it.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_042<tab>These fire crystals are for the train, aren't they?
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_043<tab>I heard about your plans to enter the dome.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_044<tab>I want to thank you for going to such lengths to stop these invaders.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_045<tab>And though he'd grumble if he knew I was asking this, please take care of Elene'shpya.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_IYAATE_000_046<tab>Anyway, I'd best be on my way─and you as well. In case you're going to meet her, I saw Wuk Lamat heading for the station.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>Shenza told me you got the crystals for him. Good work!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_051<tab>I've just returned from looking for extra help. We'll see in a moment who answers the call!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ERENVILLE_000_052<tab>All will be in readiness for them when they arrive.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ERENVILLE_000_053<tab>Dammit... I'm idle for a moment, and all I can think about is my home...
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_054<tab>Keep your chin up, Erenville. We'll be on our way soon, and we'll find your mother.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_055<tab>It'll be good to see her after all these years. There's so much I'd like to ask her about her time together with Papa.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ERENVILLE_000_056<tab>Oh, she'll talk your ears off. Once my mother starts, there's no stopping her.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_057<tab>I wouldn't want it any other way!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_058<tab>Right, let's return to helping where we can! The real work begins when the extra hands arrive!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_100_080<tab>Thanks for making the trek here. To be honest, I wasn't expecting so many of you!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKEVU_000_080<tab>Since the attack on Tuliyollal, I had been wondering if there was aught I could do to help.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKEVU_100_081<tab>So when I heard about the upcoming operation from Vow Koana, I leapt at the chance to do my part!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_MABLU_000_082<tab>Peace will be restored, and then we can all enjoy a nice cup of mezcal!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_MABLU_100_082<tab>This is our home, and we'll do whatever it takes to keep it safe.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ZURMURWUR_000_083<tab>While I assist with the efforts here, High Luminary Gurfurlur does the same at the capital.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_100_083<tab>I'm truly grateful!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_084<tab>With all of us working together, there's nothing we can't accomplish!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_085<tab>Let's get to it, my friends!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ERENVILLE_000_086<tab>Yes. Let's get to it.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WAWLIKA_000_087<tab>Alright, everyone! That'll do it!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_NITOWIKWE_000_088<tab>You've done your part. Leave it to us to finish mounting the armor and cannons, and have yourselves a hard-earned rest.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_089<tab>Thank you all again for answering the call.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ZEKOWA_000_090<tab>No need for thanks, now! Whenever you need help, just give us a holler!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKEVU_000_091<tab>Indeed. We must all do our part when our nation is imperiled.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_MABLU_000_092<tab>Hear, hear! We love Tural, and we love you, Vow Wuk Lamat!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WUKLAMAT_000_093<tab>I love you all too! Your kindness and goodwill will not be in vain, this I promise!
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_ERENVILLE_000_100<tab>Taken care of the crystals, have you? Things proceed apace here too.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WAWLIKA_000_110<tab>Thanks again for all your help. Wouldn't have been able to finish so quickly without you.
TEXT_KINGMD114_04925_WAWLIKA_000_111<tab>Go and rest up, friend. Won't be long before the train's ready.
